description.goal: Define settings to use for cache tracking purposes.

fields.default: Use these settings for any caches or properties not explicity mentioned.
fields.name: The value to use for the 'source' column.
fields.status: The initializing value for the 'status' column.
fields.updateIntervalInHours: Define how long to wait between cache updates. Set to null
fields.updateTimesIn24HrUTC: Define specific (UTC) times when this cache should be updated every day. Overrides 'updateIntervalInHours' if not null/empty array
fields.scriptPath: If applicable, define the path (relative to ROOTFOLDER) the script which updates the cache
